structure.unit: Chapter 17B METROPOLITAN MIAMI-DADE COUNTY DEMOLITION OF UNINHABITABLE STRUCTURES ORDINANCE

law.catch_line: Authority to enact chapter; short title.

text.section:
Sec. 17B-1. Authority to enact chapter; short title.
This chapter is enacted under and pursuant to the provisions of the Home Rule Charter of Government for Miami-Dade County, Florida, and shall be known and may be cited as the "Metropolitan Miami-Dade County Demolition of Uninhabitable Structures Ordinance."
